entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
